channel.title: DJ Colin Cruz 100% real SOULFUL GROOVES
channel.description:
SoulSista & SoulMan first of all thanks for visiting my PODCAST!
My name is Colin and I'm from the part of Switzerland where we speak italian - because in Switzerland we speak 3 language: italian, german and french - I'm a music lover that during the day work with the wines and in the freetime love to:
LISTEN, PLAY, BUY, SEEK, SPIN and SPREAD the GOOD VIBE in the cool places, with PASSION and for PLEASURE!
GROOVES that you can find in my mixes: Jazz,Soul, Funk, Rhythm n Blues, Classic Disco '70 '80, Afro-Latin-Brazilian Rhythms, Latin Jazz, Smooth Jazz, Underground Hip Hop & Rnb, Downtempo, Deep & Sexy soulful House .... Always looking for The Good Vibration!
After all that if you are looking for 100 % REAL SOULFUL MUSIC or some tips about GOOD WINES maybe you are in the right place!
So, I wish you a pleasant musical journey through the deepest area of my SOUL!
Enjoy !!
WARNING: MY PODCAST IS MADE ONLY WITH VINYLS !!!
<>
For the finest Soul & RnB Check out my sista Funny and her:
The Funny Show - The Souldpodcast in Italy
The Blog: http://freispoetic.altervista.org/
The Show: http://funnypodcast.podshow.com/
Peace and Love for the music! DJ Colin Cruz
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep & Sexy Soulful House, Jazz, Disco '70 '80, modern Afro-Caribbean, Latin & Brazilian Rhythms, underground hip-hop & Rnb,

item.title: SoulEXTRA - Musica Vera Profonda e Sensuale per Veri Italiani
item.description: Ecco pronta e confezionata per voi la prima puntata per il 2008 di SoulEXTRA! Il programma condotto da me in ITALIANO è dedicato alla musica HOUSE al JAZZ e al SOUL e a tutte le sonorità piu' DEEP e SOULFUL a prescindere dal genere ... l'importante è che sia Musica che suscita EMOZIONI! Vi anticipo che questa puntata di SoulEXTRA contiene un piccolo omaggio alle produzioni classiche targate Masters at Work! .... Real Real Grooves! Comunque oltre ai suoni classici dei Master at Work ho avuto anche l' onore di ospitare per un DJ SET, seppur brevissimo, il grandioso Joe Clausell che è comunque risucito a stupirci selezionando due ottimi pezzi house densi di Percussioni & Alegria terribilmente SEXY & SOULFUL per riscaldare Corpo Mente e Anima !! Come al solito la selezione è improvvisata quindi lasciatevi stupire e facendovi avvolgere dal GROOVE! Buon ascolto e buon divertimento! DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz
item.itunes:summary:
Ecco pronta e confezionata per voi la prima puntata per il 2008 di SoulEXTRA! Il programma condotto da me in ITALIANO è dedicato alla musica HOUSE al JAZZ e al SOUL e a tutte le sonorità piu' DEEP e SOULFUL a prescindere dal genere ... l'importante è che sia Musica che suscita EMOZIONI!

Comunque oltre ai suoni classici dei Master at Work ho avuto anche l' onore di ospitare per un DJ SET, seppur brevissimo, il grandioso Joe Clausell che è comunque risucito a stupirci selezionando due ottimi pezzi house densi di Percussioni & Alegria terribilmente SEXY & SOULFUL per riscaldare Corpo Mente e Anima !!
Come al solito la selezione è improvvisata quindi lasciatevi stupire e facendovi avvolgere dal GROOVE!
Buon ascolto e buon divertimento!
DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: DON'T FORGET THE REAL HIP-HOP - DJ SET FOR The Funny Show
item.description: I start DJing and buy VINYLS after discovering The Real Hip-Hop ... and this mix is my personal tribute to this FANTASTIC music! It's been a long time I wanted to do that and this time I had the opportunity - in effect this mix is my special present for THE FUNNY SHOW'S 3th ANNIVERSARY! ... only the hip hop I feel inside my SOUL! How can I say?? ... simply these grooves makes me happy! ... and you know I have a lot of other FAT BEATS I would play FOR YOU!! ... unfortunately my MD is only 74 min! THE FUNNY SHOW is a podcast from Italy dedicated ti the finest Soul, RnB, undeground Hip-Hop and any other forms of SOULFUL music. COMPLEANNO 3 DEL THE FUNNY SHOW Questo SET è il mio regalo per il compleanno del The Funny Show, l'unico vero & sincero podcast italiano dedicato a tutta la musica SOULFUL per tutta la gente in giro che è particolarmente attenta, sensibile e curiosa! Eccovi quindi la mia selezione-omaggio dedicata e compilata pensando a tutti voi ascoltatori del The Funny Show e in particolare alla persona che questo show lo conduce con simpatia, professionalità e conoscenza ... ma ovvio che lei ... la super speaker FUNNY I! 01 MOS DEF & VINIA MOJICA - GET TA STEPPIN’ (RAWKUS) 02 CRU – JUST ANOTHER CASE (VIOLATOR) 03 PEOPLE UNDER THE STAIRS – YO (OM RECORDS) 04 A TRIBE CALLED QUEST – ELECTRIC RELAXATION (JIVE) 05 MOS DEF – UMI SAYS (RAWKUS) 06 J RAWLS feat APANI – FAR AWAY (GROOVE ATTACK) 07 DE LA SOUL – I AM I BE (TOMMY BOY) 08 J LIVE – A CHARMED LIFE (7HEADS) 09 A TRIBE CALLED QUEST – JAZZ we’ve got (JIVE) 10 BAHAMADIA – SPONTANEITY (CHRYSALIYS) 11 GROUP HOME – 2 THOUSAND (PAYDAY) 12 ONIX – SHIFFTEE (JML) 13 SLUM VILLAGE – INTRO (INTERSCOPE) 14 DJ CASH MONEY feat PHIFE – FREESTYLE (WHITE) 15 JAY Z – DECEMBER 4TH (ROCaFELLA) 16 A TRIBE CALLED QUEST – AWARD TOUR (JIVE) 17 DJ ENUFF – FREESTYLE (WHITE) 18 NOTORIOUS BIG – ONE MORE CHANGE (BAD BOY) 19 SNOOP DOGG – DOGGY DOGG WORLD (DEATH ROW) 20 AFURA – WHIRLWIND THRU CITIES (D&D) 21 CROOKLYN DODGERS – RETURN OF THE C.D. (MCA) Check out The Funny Show http://www.freispoetic.altervista.org/ http://funnypodcast.podshow.com/ Fat Beats selected by DJ Colin Cruz YOUR VINYL DEALER!
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: LATIN & BRAZIL vs SOUL & RnB
item.description: With this mix you have two possibility! Side A latin & brazilian rhythms selection designed for dancing with smile! Side B is basically designed for your sexy soulful nights! Listen it and spread your love!! 100% Real Music !! A) LATIN & BRAZILIAN Grooves 01 CHAKACHAS – jungle fever (POLYDOR) 02 MILTON ZAPATA – viva zapata (SPEED) / ***** 03 BOBBY RODRIGUEZ – recuerdos de arcano (FANIA) 04 MUSIDISC – beleza nao vai embora (MUSIDISC BRAZIL) / **** 05 JOE BATAAN – gipsy woman (VAMPI SOUL) 06 SABRINA MALHEIROS – papa (FAR OUT) 07 LOU RAWLS – girl from ipanema (PIR) / ***** 08 LUIZ HENRIQUE – vivo sonhando (VERVE) 09 MARCOS VALLE – o indio è o brasil (FAR OUT) / ****** 10 MAMMOND – preguiciman (FAR OUT) B) SOUL & RnB Grooves 11 AL JARREAU – brite & sunny babe (WARNER) 12 BARRY WHITE – playing your game, Baby (UNLIMITED) / ***** 13 DWELE – lady at mahogany (WHITE) 14 ROY AYERS – gotta find a lover (POLYDOR) / ***** 15 MARLON SAUNDERS – coolin’ (BLACK HONEY) / ***** 16 KOOL AND THE GANG – summer madness (DeLITE) / ****** 17 ERYKAH BADU – time’s wastin (MOTOWN) / ****** 18 DAVINA – comin’ for you (LOUD) 19 SILENT POETS – farewell (BELLISSIMA) (( / ***** Warning: heavyweight cut )) Music Selected by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: MY SOULFUL THOUGHTS
item.description: THINK SOULFUL was my last soulful house set but as you know the seasons changed and now outside there's quite a chill in the air this morning! But no problem I have the key to solve your problems and if you want, MY SOULFUL THOUGHTS could be be your personal extreme SLEEPING -BAG to warm your BODY MIND & SOUL !! So please, feel fine listening stuffs like ELEMENTS OF LIFE (!) THE SOUL PLANET JAZZ ENESEMBLE (!!!) THE GLENN UNDERGROUND'S NEGRO MUSIC (!!!!) but above all KERRI CHANDLER - DISKO SATISFACTION ( ! ! ! ! ! !) ((absolutely one of my best soulful cut of all the times!!)) That's all - enojoy listening MY SOULFUL THOUGHTS and don't forget to spread it as much as possible!! 01 KENNY KARVAJAL - you remind me (PHUTURE SOLE) 02 BARBARA WALKER - saved me (SOULSHINE) 03 LOUIE VEGA feat Blaze - elements of life (MAW RECORDS) 04 FERTILE GROUND dj Spinna RMX - live in the light (GIANT STEP) 05 DENNIS FERRER feat Kenny Bobien - grateful RMX (WHITE) 06 BLISS aka TOMOHITO - ez one (NITE GROOVES) 07 THE SOUL PLANET JAZZ ENSEMBLE - gotta be love (SOULPLANET) 08 GLENN UNDERGROUND - negro music (UNIFIED) 09 KIMARA LOVELACE - only you (KINGSTREET) 10 BLAZE - found love (WEST END ) 11 KERRI CHANDLER - disco satisfaction (LARGE) Your Vinyl Dealer Soulful House Selection by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: SoulEXTRA - Musica Vera Profonda e Sensuale per Veri Italiani
item.description: Si rinnova l' appuntamento con SoulEXTRA! Questa volta le vostre orecchie avranno un po' meno Disco - Boogie perchè avevo bisogno di un po' di buon Jazz, Soul e Rhythm n Blues. Tuttavia molto spesso i VIAGGI MUSICALI sono imprevedibili e cosi' sono andato ad esplorare anche le produzioni Peacefrog (www.peacefrog.com) attraverso MOODYMANN e il suo BLACK MAHOGANI! ...in sospensione tra psico deep-house e atmosfere jazz!!! E allora buon ascolto, buona musica e buona CONDIVISIONE! ...e come sempre: KEEP IT SOULFUL DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz
item.itunes:summary:

Tuttavia molto spesso i VIAGGI MUSICALI sono imprevedibili e cosi' sono andato ad esplorare anche le produzioni Peacefrog (www.peacefrog.com) attraverso MOODYMANN e il suo BLACK MAHOGANI! ...in sospensione tra psico deep-house e atmosfere jazz!!!
E allora buon ascolto, buona musica e buona CONDIVISIONE! ...e come sempre:
KEEP IT SOULFUL
DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: SoulEXTRA - musica vera profonda e sensuale per veri italiani
item.description: SoulExtra è un nuovo programma musicale ideato e condotto da me in lingua italiana. Per questo motivo SoulExtra è rivolto in modo particolare all’ utenza italofona: in Italia, in Svizzera Italiana e in tutto il resto del mondo. Ho deciso di avviare questo programma in primo luogo perchè amo la musica nera e tutte le sue sfumature ma soprattutto perché desidero condividere le sensazioni e le emozioni che questa musica mi da con il maggior numero di persone possibile. Un altro motivo molto importante che mi ha spinto ad uscire allo scoperto e a cui tengo in modo particolare è la diffusione di cultura, bei suoni e conoscenza musicale alle nuove generazioni. Per questo mi auguro che tutte le mamme di buono spirito all’ascolto, decidano di somministrare la musica di SoulExtra e il mio podcast in generale alle orecchie dei loro pargoli per fare in modo che crescano sani e forti e che abbiano fin dai primi vagiti un solido background musicale. SoulExtra è un programma emozionale e quindi casuale, nel senso che non esiste una programmazione regolare, scaletta, limite di tempo o schema prestabilito da rispettare, a partire per l’ appunto dalla selezione dei brani che è volutamente casuale visto che probabilmente registrero’ SoulExtra ogni volta che decidero’ di riordinare i vinili. La sola soddisfazione a cui posso ambire e che mi appagherebbe è che qualche vero italiano ascolti SoulExtra e poi pensi che quello che sto facendo è una bella cosa. Il repertorio musicale all’interno di SoulExtra è molto ampio e non si focalizza su nessun genere in modo particolare. Amo e riamo la musica nera dal Jazz di fine anni ’50 (Hard Bop) che mi fa’ sognare di essere in fumoso jazz club, al Rhythm n Blues, il Funk, i classici Soul, i dischi di artisti semisconosciuti che ho trovato per caso in qualche negozio di dischi, la musica brasiliana, la musica africana, il latin jazz, i classici della disco music nera ’70 ’80, l’ Acid Jazz, l’hip-hop e l’RnB indipendente e infine il grande amore che mi soddisfa ed è al mio fianco da alcuni anni la … Lei e solo Lei la musica house più PROFONDA e SENSUALE! SoulExtra non è un programma pretenzioso e non ha nulla di particolare da insegnare a nessuno se non la condivisione di emozioni attraverso la buona musica con gente attenta, sensibile e curiosa. Allora per il momento non posso far altro che augurarvi un piacevole viaggio musicale in mia compagnia e della mia musica, e a proposito non prendetemi troppo sul serio perché rimarreste delusi! Ascoltare per credere! DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz
item.itunes:summary:
SoulExtra è un nuovo programma musicale ideato e condotto da me in lingua italiana. Per questo motivo SoulExtra è rivolto in modo particolare all’ utenza italofona: in Italia, in Svizzera Italiana e in tutto il resto del mondo.
Ho deciso di avviare questo programma in primo luogo perchè amo la musica nera e tutte le sue sfumature ma soprattutto perché desidero condividere le sensazioni e le emozioni che questa musica mi da con il maggior numero di persone possibile. Il repertorio musicale all’interno di SoulExtra è molto ampio e non si focalizza su nessun genere in modo particolare. Amo e riamo la musica nera dal Jazz di fine anni ’50 (Hard Bop) che mi fa’ sognare di essere in fumoso jazz club, al Rhythm n Blues, il Funk, i classici Soul, i dischi di artisti semisconosciuti che ho trovato per caso in qualche negozio di dischi, la musica brasiliana, la musica africana, il latin jazz, i classici della disco music nera ’70 ’80, l’ Acid Jazz, l’hip-hop e l’RnB indipendente e infine il grande amore che mi soddisfa ed è al mio fianco da alcuni anni la … Lei e solo Lei la musica house più PROFONDA e SENSUALE!

Allora per il momento non posso far altro che augurarvi un piacevole viaggio musicale in mia compagnia e della mia musica, e a proposito non prendetemi troppo sul serio perché rimarreste delusi! Ascoltare per credere!
DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: DISCO CLASSIC
item.description: In this DISCO CLASSIC mix I spin some of my favourite BOOGIE oogie LPs! 70s 80s was a great era for these evergreen classics! And for me every time is a big emotion play this EMOTIONAL MUSIC and look the feedback of the crowd! ...sorry but now the dancefloor is calling me! 01 PEABO BRYSON - born to love (EMI) 02 THE LIVE BAND - chance for hope (T.S.O.B) 03 THE JAMMERS - what have you got to loose (UNIDISC) 04 BILLY GRIFFIN - hold me tighter in the rain (CBS) 05 DISCO CLASSIC - but I can dub you till the morning (PROMO) 06 GEORGE DUKE - I want you for my self (EPIC) 07 EVELYN KING - I'm in Love (RCA) 08 FAT LARRY'S BAND - ACT LIKE YOU KNOW (UNIDISC) 09 RON RICHARDSON - ooh wee baby (GTO) 10 LEROY BURGESS - heartbreaker (SALSOUL) 11 INNER LIFE - moment of my life (SALSOUL) Enjoy these DISCO GROOVES!! Peace DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: JAZZINO - (KEEP IT VINTAGE !!)
item.description: Hey Man are you looking for some classic Jazz tune ?? I offer to you my new JAZZino set. Soul Jazz, smooth and with some latin vibes injection! I hope it will touch your SOUL ! 01 LOU DONALDSON - ONE CYLINDER (Blue Note) 02 ART FARMER - A NIGHT AT TONY'S (Prestige) 03 HERBIE HANCOCK - MAZE (Blue Note) 04 THE INVISIBLE SESSION - (Schema) 05 FREDDIE HUBBARD - GIBRALTAR (CTI) 06 JOE BAATAN - ORDINARY GUY (Suss'd) 07 JON LUCIEN - LISTEN LOVE (Polygram) 08 RAY BARRETTO - ACID (Castle) 09 LINDBERG efat Mark Murphy - LITTLE THINGS (Raw Fusion) 10 MAITZ - GLOOM (Vertikal) 11 MINNIE RIPERTON - INSIDE MY LOVE (Capitol) 12 GERARDO FRISINA - BEYOND THE MOON (Schema) Have a good time! Music selected by DJ Colin Cruz

Music selected by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: THINK SOULFUL - AUGUST 2007
item.description: With this THINK SOULFUL mix I say GOODBYE to the 2007 summer. The vintage - time is drawing near so the work in the cellar become intensive and tiring! In this selection I try to put great voices and productions with a special SOUL FEELING! I hope you like it! I close my set (11) with a classic house joint produced by Lenny Fontana...COOL!! The last cut (12) is a live by DJ ENUFF ...not House but REAL! To sum up I hope that my THINK SOULFUL mix give to you a Good Mood and bright your day!! So please, DOWNLOAD and SPREAD everywhere my THINK SOULFUL set! 01 PHONIQUE – Pascal Soul Vocal RMX (Seasons Recordings) 02 CORDELL McCLARY – Traveling (Space Kat) 03 BELITA WOODS & LEROY BURGESS – Best of Me RMX (Basement Boys) 04 LOUIS BENEDETTI feat David Ruffin JR – Show you my Love (SoulShine) 05 FUZION feat Chirs Herbert – I’m so glad (Fuzion) 06 LISA SHAW – Let it ride (Naked Music) 07 RICHARD EARNSHAW – People Are People (Soulfuric DEEP) 08 JAY J & MARK GRANT feat Latrice – Love is RMX (ULTRA) 09 BACK ROOM SOUNDS – Northern Soul (deVICE) 10 ROLAND CLARK – Resist RMX (Fluential) 11 ANDRICKA HALL – I’ll give you Love (SOULSHINE) 12 DJ ENUFF – only for dj (White Label) Music Selected by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: WORLDWIDE UNDERGROUND (JUNE 2007)
item.description: This is my first WORLDWIDE UNDERGROUND session! Fresh selections where I mix the classics with the NU: FREE JAZZ, jazz, RARE GROOVES, SOUL, FUNK, and any other TUNES I feel REAL & SOULFUL! I chosen "" WORLDWIDE UNDERGROUND"" for TWO reason: (ONE) Is my personal declaration of LOVE to one of my FAVOURITE nu-SOUL woman...miss ERYKAH BADU and her last work "WORLDWIDE UNDERGROUND EP" (TWO) Is a tribute to Mr Gilles Peterson and is WORLDWIDE who in the PAST YEARS had strongly influenced MY MUSIC TASTE !! ...I remember the emotion the first time I listened the FELA'S EXPENSIVE SHIT!!! So, listen, download and spread this exclusive WORLDWIDE session made BY modern & vintage SOULFUL_TUNES ! (JAZZ, FUNK, LATIN, AFRO, BRAZIL) ..and please, ...don't forget to drink a QUALITY glass of WHINE while you're listening my WORLDWIDE. but above all ENJOY the MUSIC JOURNEY around ... The real Grooves !! 01 JAZZ INTRO - UNKNOWN (WHITE) 02 JOE CLAUSSELL feat Cassandra W. - VOODOO REPRISE (CAPITOL) 03 AMMONCONTACT - THE STARS ARE SINGING TOO (SOUL JAZZ) 04 LATIN TUNE - UNKNOWN (WHITE) 05 MADE IN BRASIL - BABETE (PAUSA RECORDS) 06 LOS LADRONES - LAS LUCES DEL NORTE (WESTBURY MUSIC) 07 MAW feat Lilliana Chachian - BRAZILIAN BEAT rmx (EMI) 08 REBIRTH - THIS JOURNEY IN (KAJMERE SOUND) 09 DONALD BYRD - SISTER LOVE (BLUE NOTE) 10 FRANK 1 - LET THE RECORD PLAY (YORUBA) 11 PHAROAH SANDERS - HEART IS A MELODY OF TIME (EMI) 12 OSCAR - AFRO_DISIAC (WELL TUNED) 13 NICOLA CONTE - SEVERAL SHADES OF DAWN (BLUE NOTE) MIXED by DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz

(TWO) Is a tribute to Mr Gilles Peterson and is WORLDWIDE who in the PAST YEARS had strongly influenced MY MUSIC TASTE !! ...I remember the emotion the first time I listened the FELA'S EXPENSIVE SHIT!!!

item.title: EMMENTALER
item.description: I LOVE THE HOUSE when IS TOO FUNKY ( I feel the underground Hip-Hop!!) and the problem IS that everytime I start to do this KIND of FUNKY house set when I hear SOME horn,sax,piano or jazz sample my mind and my hand become DEEP so I start to spin some DEEP cuts .... also in this EMMENTALER mix with 09 Demarkus Lewis I had the THE TEMPTATION to go on with a deepCUT (actually ELECTRIC LADY is a little bit DEEP & Jazzy) ....fortunately I save my FUNKY SET with the BIG Joey Youngman (much respect !) ... So, I do it .... my FunkyHouse (EMMENTALER!) set is ready ... NOTE: the emmentaler is tasty and smooth Switzerland's Cheese like this KIND of funky house! For much Info visit:www.emmentaler.ch So please taste this MIX slowly I hope you like it ....and also the CHEESE ! 01 DJ FREESTYLE – GRIZ & BOYZ – GOOD FAMILY 02 DJ BANJO – YOU GOT SOUL – SHHH 03 TROYDON – I REMEMBER – DROP 04 THE GIRTH – I’LL BE GONE – WHITE 05 LANCE DESARDI – COMPUTER PEOPLE – MUZIQUE 06 FREQUENT F. – NOW BOARDING AT GAME 17 – FETISH 07 DEMARKUS LEWIS – CRUNCH – FLAT & ROUND 08 RODNEY HUNTER – ELECTRIC LADY – G STONE 09 JOEY YOUNGMAN – BODY & SOUL – FETISH 10 DJ FREESTYLE – TELL ME – GOOD FAMILY 11 JOESKY – FIND A WAY - MAYA LISTEN, ENJOY & SPREAD! MusicSelection by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: JAZZINO - MAY 2007
item.description: This JAZZINO begin with two CLASSICs late '50 CUTs ... Walkin' and Twelve Inch introduce slowly THE jazz MOODS with Novi Sigers I change atmosphere and JOE HENDERSON is the deepest... DIZZY'S BUSINESS is a beautiful LIVE JAZZ SESSION! With the Harlem River Drive the Jazz become FREE, DEEP AND FUNKY and with THE PHARAOH I give TO you another cool LIVE SESSION !! (In the basement is MY WINNER!!) The last cut is my special OUTRO, NO JAZZ but deep & soulFUL!! SO, If you feel FINE with THE JAZZ MOODS DOWNLOAD AND SPREAD this mix!! 01 MILES DAVIS ALL STAR – WALKIN’ (LIVE) CAPITOL 02 CURTIS FULLER – TWELVE INCH RCA 03 NOVI SINGERS – SECRET LIFE MPS 04 JOE HENDERSON – LAS PALMAS MILESTONE 05 CANNONBALL ADDERLEY – DIZZY’S BUSINESS(L) RIVERSIDE 06 HARLEM RIVER DRIVE – H.R.D. ROULETTE 07 LARRY BRIGHT – TOMORROW’S END ASCAP 08 THE PHARAOHS – IN THE BASEMENT LUN N’ HAIGHT 09 GIL SCOTT HERON – 17 TH STREET RUMAL 10 THE POETS OF RHYTHM – THE JAUNT QUANNUM 11 MI HERMANO – COMO UM SOL MR BONGO Selection by DJ Colin Cruz DETAILS - JAZZ PERFORMERS : (coming soon)

item.title: WAITINGForSUMMER2007 Part 2
item.description: This is the part 2 of my immaginary day at the beach RELAXING in the summer breeze with the kind of music that I'd like to listen! The sessions is compiled thinking DEEP & SOULFUL for THE real SOULFUL HEADS and I guarantee you can FIND SOME serious soulful VOCAL cut ! ...listen JOSH MILAN performing BIG MISTAKE !! ....very hot! So, listen, spread and enjoy my new mix made FOR YOU!! 01 Rodney Carter - Run to me - Vega 02 Frank 1 - Let the record play - Yoruba 03 Carolyn Victorian - Everything you want - Kingstreet 04 Kenny Dope -Holyday - Ubiquity 05 Bl vd. East - It’s your life - Soulshine 06 Fett - Nightlife - Farplane 07Berr Eduard - Running away - Soulshine 08 Glenn Lewis - Passion - Defected 09 Nadirah Shakoor - Pride - Sacem 10 Off the Cuff - Shake - Soulfuric 11 Alexander Hope - Big mistake - Westend selecta by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: WAITINGForSUMMER2007 Part1
item.description: This is my mix for an immaginary day in the beach. Listening house with deep bass and cool percussion !! but I DON'T forget the JAZZ so I introduced the house session with two POWERFUL LATIN JAZZ CUTS !! At the end the mix become darker, ...and "AFREEKA" introduce what will happen during the NIGHT SESSION !! ...SORRY BUT NOW I have to drink something ! 01 Quartetto Moderno - Mr Bond 02 Luis Ferri - I love samba 03 Kathi Brown - Never again 04 One 51 - Si weka 05 The sumo quintet - d minor 06 Audiowhores - subject of my affection 07 Mood II Swing - closer 08 Pop sucks - slow love 09 Mood - moonshine 10 Louie Vega - mozalounge 11 Sumo - santiago boys 12 Louis Benedetti - rmam 13 Eddie Matos - afreeka selected by: DJ Colin Cruz JusDance !!
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz
item.itunes:summary:

but I DON'T forget the JAZZ so

selected by: DJ Colin Cruz
JusDance !!

item.title: SOULSTANCE - APRIL 2007
item.description: NEW REVIEW - AUGUST 2007 Hey Soulbrother/Sister !!! This mix is terribly SEXY, SMOOTH and SOULFUL !! For real ! I listen it many times during this SUMMER and everytime is a wonderful music journey a very special emotion! You can play it when you want but preferably when you want to share with someone the real passion !! Check it out! I'm sure it will capture your soul! This mix is my tribute to some OLD SKOOL and NEW SOUL VOICES that I love, like Erykah, Peven, Alfonzo, Next, Sade and other SOULFUL PERFORMERS . Anyway, I say good-bye with a DEEP LATIN INSTRUMENTAL signed Tom & Joyce!! .....High quality latin & soulful instrumental cut !! Use it FOR DREAMING! MY ADVICE for you is to listen this mix ONLY when you want relax! 01 D’ ANGELO - AFRICA (VIRGIN) 02 JOE - UNTITLED (WHITE) 03 GILL SCOTT - HONEY MOLASSES (HIDDEN BEACH) 04 NEXT - REPRESENT ME (ARISTA) 05 ERIKAH BADU - THINK TWICE (KEDAR) 06 ERIKAH BADU - ORANGE MOON (MOTOWN) 07 ROY AYERS - EVERYBODY LOVES THE SUNSHINE(POLYDOR) 08 DONELL JONES - IN THE HOOD (LA FACE) 09 ALFONZO HUNTER - WHEN YOU’RE READY(EMI) 10 EDEE - MAKE IT LAST (WHITE) 11 SADE - NOTHING CAN COME (EPIC) 12 THE JONES GIRLS - NIGHTS OVER EGYPT (WHITE) 13 PEVEN EVERETT - I WANNA MAKE LOVE (S.CONF) 14 NEXT - PHONE SEX (ARISTA) 15 UNTITLED - UNKNOWN (WHITE) 16 DWELE - UNKNOWN (WHITE) 17 MAXI - LOVER TO LOVER (B.NOTE) 18 TOM & JOYCE - RELAXIN’ (YELLOW) Music selected by DJ Colin Cruz Bye

item.title: WORLDWIDE UNDERGROUND 01
item.description: WELCOME !! ... The fact is that I wished to play a Whitney Houston's s SONG but to do that I thought it was NECESSARY to do AN INTRODUCTION! ....so take some minutes AND LISTEN my various INTRODUCTION COMPOSE BY 13 TRACKS ! ...naturally very: deep, jazzy, latin, BRAZILERO, AFRO ( FELA KUTI ! ) ... not sounding like any other of MY MIXES !! listen & SPREAD 01 SABRINA MALHEIROS – MARACATUEIRA RMX (FAR OUT) 02 PUBBLIC DOMAIN – MIEKE HOUDT U WAST (HAIKU) 03 NU PERSPECTIVE – AFRO BRASILEIRO (GIANT STEP) 04 ARCOIRIS – ANNO ZERO RMX (IRMA) 05 WHAREHOUSE CHOIR – HANG ON IN (NITEVIBES) 06 DIRTY 30 – RED TEMPLE BALLS (TRUFFLE) 07 12'' INCH - HOT DISCO (WHITE) 08 JOE HENDERSON – GAZELLE (ACE) 09 TAMBU – COCO MY MY (MONTUNO) 10 FELA KUTI – AUTHORITY STEALING (KALAKUTA) 11 BETTY CARTER – THAT SUNDAY THAT SUMMER (VERVE) 12 LONNIE LISTON SMITH – ASTRAL TRAVELLIN (BMI) 13 SILK 130 – SEASON’ S CHANGE (OVUM) 14 TRIBUTE TO WITHNEY HOUSTON Music selected by DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: Jazzino - March2007
item.description: This JAZZINO is a session with some of my favourites jazz performers: Art, Freddie, Herbie, .. and also the charming Betty Carter's voice in "Tight" and "Fake", ...I love the felling that gives the crowd! I add also the deep Anggun voice and her Summer in Paris! My advice for you: Jazzino is a deep Jazz mix with a final disco Classic perfect for your Jazz dinner! 01 3 Sounds - out of this world 02 Freddie Hubbard - the littlest one of all (live) 03 Bobby Hutcherson - montara 04 George Duke - my soul 05 Horace Silver - song for my father ++ 06 Art Blakey - time off ++ 07 Herbie Hancock - survival of the fittest 08 Dexter Gordon - love for sale 09 Betty Carter - thight (live) ++ 10 Betty Carter - fake (live) 11 Quartetto Moderno - mr bond ++ 12 Anggun - summer in paris ++! 13 Arnie’s Love - I am out of your love ++!! Enjoy This Jazz Selections !!! Music Selection by. DJ Colin Cruz
item.dc:creator: DJ Colin Cruz
item.itunes:summary:
This JAZZINO is a session with some of my favourites jazz performers: Art, Freddie, Herbie, .. and also the charming Betty Carter's voice in "Tight" and "Fake", ...I love the felling that gives the crowd! I add also the deep Anggun voice and her Summer in Paris!
My advice for you: Jazzino is a deep Jazz mix with a final disco Classic perfect for your Jazz dinner!
01 3 Sounds - out of this world 02 Freddie Hubbard - the littlest one of all (live) 03 Bobby Hutcherson - montara 04 George Duke - my soul 05 Horace Silver - song for my father ++ 06 Art Blakey - time off ++ 07 Herbie Hancock - survival of the fittest 08 Dexter Gordon - love for sale 09 Betty Carter - thight (live) ++ 10 Betty Carter - fake (live) 11 Quartetto Moderno - mr bond ++ 12 Anggun - summer in paris ++! 13 Arnie’s Love - I am out of your love ++!!
Enjoy This Jazz Selections !!!
Music Selection by. DJ Colin Cruz

item.title: LIVE@HOTELVillaSassa (MARCH2007) - Switzerland
item.description: If you love the soulful VOCAL house YOU HAVE TO download this mix! Male and female voices at the top! OK, every cut in this mix are truly deep & soulful but for me the winner is: Kenny Bobien, Jovann, Moses Mc Clean, Yoio C, and ..."Ascension" and for you???!! 1.TORTURED SOUL fall in love (Central Park) 2.BLAZE feat Ultra Nate Wonderful place (SUSU) 3.KENNY BOBIEN Spread love (SoulGroove) 4.HALO feat Maya his love (CityDeep) 5.JOVANN He’ s move (NextMoov) 6.BRENT LAURENCE Closer rmx (Soulshine) 7.ANANE Nos vida (Vega) 8.MOSES MC CLEAN Let’ s be free (Phuture Sole) 9.YOIO C It’s around (Seasons) 10.MAXWELL Ascension (Columbia) Music selected by: DJ Colin Cruz Enjoy!! Enjoy also THIS KENNY BOBIEN performance !!
